text: Over the years, consumer behaviors
and expectations have fundamentally changed.
And to keep up, retailers have had to scramble
to transform their digital commerce experiences.
AWS is the foremost pioneer in cloud services
with industry leading solutions
that help businesses meet today's consumer expectations,
optimize operations, and improve their business insights.
Our technologies empower retailers
to create exceptional customer experiences,
helping them grow as a business
and elevate them above the competition.
From unparalleled personalized recommendations
to same-day delivery services,
to check out shopping and more. Within the
AWS Solutions library,
AWS has a comprehensive portfolio of guidance, purpose-built

allowing your retail organizations
to innovate and grow faster.
When a customer's desired product is unavailable
and no substitution is readily available, it can lead
to the loss of the sale as well as a frustrated customer.
In this age of personal shoppers
and curbside pickups, this has become an increasing problem,
not just for traditional online retailers,
but also for brick and mortar retailers, such as grocers,
picking up orders for customers in the store. With guidance
for product substitutions on AWS,
your retail organization can use Amazon open search service
and natural language processing
to create relevant recommendations for customers searching
for out-of-Stock products. Product description
and beddings are extracted with machine learning
and stored in a vector database.
When someone is looking for a product that is out of stock,
similar products from the database will be suggested.
You can also add category
or price filters to increase
the relevance of the recommendations.
Personalization has become a standard across retail
and is now considered a must-have capability in order
to remain competitive.
Using fully automated end-to-end architecture
and machine learning services,
Guidance for Retail Personalization on AWS helps you offer
personalized experiences and interactions to your shoppers.
Additionally, it provides reference APIs
that allow real-time product recommendations to be added
to digital commerce, mobile applications and portals.
By predicting future demand
and purchasing patterns,
retailers improve the demand forecast, which then helps
to ensure the right quantity
of products offered to customers.
Powered by machine learning, Guidance for Demand Forecasting
for Retail on AWS helps you improve your customer
experience and prepare for customer demand
with accurate forecasts. By ingesting past sales data.
the Amazon Forecast service determines the most accurate
algorithm to apply
to each product then determines future demand.
With a more accurate forecast,
retailers can better plan their use of resources.
In an increasingly competitive retail environment,
leveraging guidance resources from the AWS Solutions library
gives companies a distinct edge.
From product recommendations,

You can use retail technology from AWS
